solution_line_template: On Thursday he washed {wednesday_loads}*{double_factor}=<<{wednesday_loads}*{double_factor}={thursday_loads}>>{thursday_loads} loads of laundry
On Friday he washed {thursday_loads}/{half_factor}=<<{thursday_loads}/{half_factor}={friday_loads}>>{friday_loads} loads of laundry
On Saturday he washed {wednesday_loads}/{third_factor}=<<{wednesday_loads}/{third_factor}={saturday_loads}>>{saturday_loads} loads of laundry

In total he washed {wednesday_loads}+{thursday_loads}+{friday_loads}+{saturday_loads}= <<{wednesday_loads}+{thursday_loads}+{friday_loads}+{saturday_loads}={total_loads}>>{total_loads} loads of laundry
